linear.value: An h1 header============Paragraphs are separated by a blank line.2nd paragraph. *Italic*, **bold**, and `monospace`. Itemized listslook like:  * this one  * that one  * the other oneNote that --- not considering the asterisk --- the actual textcontent starts at 4-columns in.> Block quotes are> written like so.

<?php
$count = 0;
$parent = isset($parent) ? (integer) $parent : 0;
if ($parent > 0) {
    $criteria = array(
        'parent' => $parent,
        'deleted' => false,
        'published' => true,
    );
    $count = $modx->getCount('modResource', $criteria);
}
return (string) $count;
